accessor-pairs.name: accessor-pairs
accessor-pairs.description: setter 必须有对应的 getter，getter 可以没有对应的 setter
accessor-pairs.badExample: const foo = { set bar(value) { this.barValue = 'bar ' + value; } };
accessor-pairs.goodExample: const foo = { set bar(value) { this.barValue = 'bar ' + value; }, get bar() { return this.barValue; } }; const bar = { get foo() { return this.fooValue; } };

array-callback-return.name: array-callback-return
array-callback-return.description: 数组的方法除了 forEach 之外，回调函数必须有返回值
array-callback-return.badExample: const foo = [1, 2, 3].map((num) => { console.log(num * num); });
array-callback-return.goodExample: const foo = [1, 2, 3].map((num) => { return num * num; });

block-scoped-var.name: block-scoped-var
block-scoped-var.description: 将 var 定义的变量视为块作用域，禁止在块外使用
block-scoped-var.reason: 已经禁止使用 var 了

camelcase.name: camelcase
camelcase.description: 变量名必须是 camelcase 风格的
camelcase.reason: 很多 api 或文件名都不是 camelcase 风格的

capitalized-comments.name: capitalized-comments
capitalized-comments.description: 注释的首字母必须大写

class-methods-use-this.name: class-methods-use-this
class-methods-use-this.description: 在类的非静态方法中，必须存在对 this 的引用

complexity.name: complexity
complexity.description: 禁止函数的循环复杂度超过 20
complexity.badExample: function foo() { if (i === 1) console.log(i); if (i === 2) console.log(i); if (i === 3) console.log(i); if (i === 4) console.log(i); if (i === 5) console.log(i); if (i === 6) console.log(i); if (i === 7) console.log(i); if (i === 8) console.log(i); if (i === 9) console.log(i); if (i === 10) console.log(i); if (i === 11) console.log(i); if (i === 12) console.log(i); if (i === 13) console.log(i); if (i === 14) console.log(i); if (i === 15) console.log(i); if (i === 16) console.log(i); if (i === 17) console.log(i); if (i === 18) console.log(i); if (i === 19) console.log(i); if (i === 20) console.log(i); }
complexity.goodExample: function foo() { if (i === 1) console.log(i); if (i === 2) console.log(i); if (i === 3) console.log(i); if (i === 4) console.log(i); if (i === 5) console.log(i); if (i === 6) console.log(i); if (i === 7) console.log(i); if (i === 8) console.log(i); if (i === 9) console.log(i); if (i === 10) console.log(i); bar(i); } function bar(i) { if (i === 11) console.log(i); if (i === 12) console.log(i); if (i === 13) console.log(i); if (i === 14) console.log(i); if (i === 15) console.log(i); if (i === 16) console.log(i); if (i === 17) console.log(i); if (i === 18) console.log(i); if (i === 19) console.log(i); if (i === 20) console.log(i); }

consistent-return.name: consistent-return
consistent-return.description: 禁止函数在不同分支返回不同类型的值
consistent-return.reason: 缺少 TypeScript 的支持，类型判断是不准确的

constructor-super.name: constructor-super
constructor-super.badExample: class Foo extends Bar { constructor() {} }
constructor-super.goodExample: class Foo extends Bar { constructor() { super(); } }

default-case-last.name: default-case-last
default-case-last.description: switch 语句中的 default 必须在最后
default-case-last.badExample: switch (foo) { default: bar(); break; case 1: baz(); break; }
default-case-last.goodExample: switch (foo) { case 1: baz(); break; default: bar(); break; }

default-param-last.name: default-param-last
default-param-last.description: 有默认值的参数必须放在函数参数的末尾

dot-notation.name: dot-notation
dot-notation.description: 禁止使用 foo['bar']，必须写成 foo.bar
dot-notation.reason: 当需要写一系列属性的时候，可以更统一

eqeqeq.name: eqeqeq
eqeqeq.description: 必须使用 === 或 !==，禁止使用 == 或 !=
eqeqeq.badExample: if (foo == 1) { } if (bar != null) { }
eqeqeq.goodExample: if (foo === 1) { } if (bar !== null) { }

for-direction.name: for-direction
for-direction.description: 禁止方向错误的 for 循环
for-direction.badExample: for (let i = 0; i < 10; i--) { // do something }
for-direction.goodExample: for (let i = 0; i < 10; i++) { // do something }

func-name-matching.name: func-name-matching
func-name-matching.description: 函数赋值给变量的时候，函数名必须与变量名一致
func-name-matching.badExample: const foo = function bar() {};
func-name-matching.goodExample: const foo = function () {}; const bar = function bar() {};

func-style.name: func-style
func-style.description: 必须只使用函数声明或只使用函数表达式

getter-return.name: getter-return
getter-return.description: getter 必须有返回值，并且禁止返回空
getter-return.badExample: const user = { get name() { // do something } }; class User { get name() { return; } }
getter-return.goodExample: const user = { get name() { return 'Alex'; } }; class User { get name() { return this.name; } }

grouped-accessor-pairs.name: grouped-accessor-pairs
grouped-accessor-pairs.description: setter 和 getter 必须写在一起
grouped-accessor-pairs.badExample: const foo = { set bar(value) { this.barValue = 'bar ' + value; }, baz: 1, get bar() { return this.barValue; } };
grouped-accessor-pairs.goodExample: const foo = { set bar(value) { this.barValue = 'bar ' + value; }, get bar() { return this.barValue; }, baz: 1 };

guard-for-in.name: guard-for-in
guard-for-in.description: for in 内部必须有 hasOwnProperty
guard-for-in.badExample: for (key in foo) { doSomething(key); }
guard-for-in.goodExample: for (key in foo) { if (Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(foo, key)) { doSomething(key); } }

id-blacklist.name: id-blacklist
id-blacklist.description: 禁止使用指定的标识符

id-match.name: id-match
id-match.description: 限制变量名必须匹配指定的正则表达式

init-declarations.name: init-declarations
init-declarations.description: 变量必须在定义的时候赋值

line-comment-position.name: line-comment-position
line-comment-position.description: 单行注释必须写在上一行

lines-between-class-members.name: lines-between-class-members
lines-between-class-members.description: 类的成员之间是否需要空行
lines-between-class-members.reason: 有时为了紧凑需要挨在一起，有时为了可读性需要空一行

max-classes-per-file.name: max-classes-per-file
max-classes-per-file.description: 限制一个文件中类的数量

max-depth.name: max-depth
max-depth.description: 代码块嵌套的深度禁止超过 5 层
max-depth.badExample: function foo() { if (true) { if (true) { if (true) { if (true) { if (true) { if (true) { } } } } } } }
max-depth.goodExample: function foo() { if (true) { if (true) { if (true) { if (true) { if (true) { } } } } } }

max-lines.name: max-lines
max-lines.description: 限制一个文件最多的行数

max-lines-per-function.name: max-lines-per-function
max-lines-per-function.description: 限制函数块中的代码行数

max-nested-callbacks.name: max-nested-callbacks
max-nested-callbacks.description: 回调函数嵌套禁止超过 3 层，多了请用 async await 替代
max-nested-callbacks.badExample: foo(() => { bar(() => { baz(() => { qux(() => {}); }); }); });
max-nested-callbacks.goodExample: foo(async () => { await bar(); await baz(); await qux(); });

max-params.name: max-params
max-params.description: 函数的参数禁止超过 3 个
max-params.badExample: function foo(a1, a2, a3, a4) {}
max-params.goodExample: function foo(a1, a2, a3) {} function bar({ a1, a2, a3, a4 }) {}

max-statements.name: max-statements
max-statements.description: 限制函数块中的语句数量

max-statements-per-line.name: max-statements-per-line
max-statements-per-line.description: 限制一行中的语句数量

multiline-comment-style.name: multiline-comment-style
multiline-comment-style.reason: 能写注释已经不容易了，不需要限制太多

new-cap.name: new-cap
new-cap.description: new 后面的类名必须首字母大写
new-cap.badExample: new foo(); new foo.bar();
new-cap.goodExample: new Foo(); new foo.Bar(); Foo();

no-array-constructor.name: no-array-constructor
no-array-constructor.description: 禁止使用 Array 构造函数时传入的参数超过一个
no-array-constructor.reason:
参数为一个时表示创建一个指定长度的数组，比较常用
参数为多个时表示创建一个指定内容的数组，此时可以用数组字面量实现，不必使用构造函数
no-array-constructor.badExample: const foo = Array(0, 1, 2); // [0, 1, 2] const bar = new Array(0, 1, 2); // [0, 1, 2]
no-array-constructor.goodExample: const foo = [0, 1, 2]; Array(3); // [empty × 3] new Array(3); // [empty × 3] Array(3).fill('foo'); // ["foo", "foo", "foo"] new Array(3).fill('foo'); // ["foo", "foo", "foo"]

no-async-promise-executor.name: no-async-promise-executor
no-async-promise-executor.description: 禁止将 async 函数做为 new Promise 的回调函数
no-async-promise-executor.reason: 出现这种情况时，一般不需要使用 new Promise 实现异步了
no-async-promise-executor.badExample: new Promise(async (resolve) => { setTimeout(resolve, 1000); });
no-async-promise-executor.goodExample: new Promise((resolve) => { setTimeout(resolve, 1000); });

no-await-in-loop.name: no-await-in-loop
no-await-in-loop.description: 禁止将 await 写在循环里，因为这样就无法同时发送多个异步请求了
no-await-in-loop.reason: 要求太严格了，有时需要在循环中写 await

no-caller.name: no-caller
no-caller.description: 禁止使用 caller 或 callee
no-caller.badExample: function foo(n) { if (n <= 0) { return; } arguments.callee(n - 1); }
no-caller.goodExample: function foo(n) { if (n <= 0) { return; } foo(n - 1); }

no-case-declarations.name: no-case-declarations
no-case-declarations.description: switch 的 case 内有变量定义的时候，必须使用大括号将 case 内变成一个代码块
no-case-declarations.badExample: switch (foo) { case 1: const x = 1; break; }
no-case-declarations.goodExample: switch (foo) { case 1: { const x = 1; break; } }

no-class-assign.name: no-class-assign
no-class-assign.description: 禁止对已定义的 class 重新赋值
no-class-assign.badExample: class Foo {} Foo = {};
no-class-assign.goodExample: class Foo {}

no-compare-neg-zero.name: no-compare-neg-zero
no-compare-neg-zero.badExample: if (foo === -0) { }
no-compare-neg-zero.goodExample: if (foo === 0) { }

no-cond-assign.name: no-cond-assign
no-cond-assign.description: 禁止在测试表达式中使用赋值语句，除非这个赋值语句被括号包起来了
no-cond-assign.badExample: if (foo = 0) { }
no-cond-assign.goodExample: if (foo === 0) { } if (bar === (foo = 0)) { }

no-const-assign.name: no-const-assign
no-const-assign.description: 禁止对使用 const 定义的常量重新赋值
no-const-assign.badExample: const foo = 1; foo = 2;
no-const-assign.goodExample: let foo = 1; foo = 2; for (const bar in [1, 2, 3]) { console.log(bar); }

no-constant-condition.name: no-constant-condition
no-constant-condition.description: 禁止将常量作为分支条件判断中的测试表达式，但允许作为循环条件判断中的测试表达式
no-constant-condition.badExample: if (true) { } const foo = 0 ? 'bar' : 'baz';
no-constant-condition.goodExample: for (; true; ) { if (foo === 0) break; } while (true) { if (foo === 0) break; }

no-constructor-return.name: no-constructor-return
no-constructor-return.description: 禁止在构造函数中返回值
no-constructor-return.badExample: class Foo { constructor(bar) { this.bar = bar; return bar; } }
no-constructor-return.goodExample: class Foo { constructor(bar) { if (!bar) { return; } this.bar = bar; } }

no-control-regex.name: no-control-regex
no-control-regex.description: 禁止在正则表达式中出现 Ctrl 键的 ASCII 表示，即禁止使用 /\x1f/
no-control-regex.reason: 几乎不会遇到这种场景

no-debugger.name: no-debugger
no-debugger.badExample: if (foo) { debugger; }
no-debugger.goodExample: if (foo) { // debugger; }

no-delete-var.name: no-delete-var
no-delete-var.description: 禁止对一个变量使用 delete

no-div-regex.name: no-div-regex
no-div-regex.description: 禁止在正则表达式中出现形似除法操作符的开头，如 let a = /=foo/
no-div-regex.reason: 有代码高亮的话，在阅读这种代码时，也完全不会产生歧义或理解上的困难

no-dupe-args.name: no-dupe-args
no-dupe-args.description: 禁止在函数参数中出现重复名称的参数

no-dupe-class-members.name: no-dupe-class-members
no-dupe-class-members.description: 禁止重复定义类的成员
no-dupe-class-members.badExample: class Foo { bar() {} bar() {} }
no-dupe-class-members.goodExample: class Foo { bar() {} baz() {} }

no-dupe-else-if.name: no-dupe-else-if
no-dupe-else-if.description: 禁止 if else 的条件判断中出现重复的条件
no-dupe-else-if.badExample: if (foo) { console.log(foo); } else if (foo) { console.log(bar); }
no-dupe-else-if.goodExample: if (foo) { console.log(foo); } else if (bar) { console.log(bar); }

no-dupe-keys.name: no-dupe-keys
no-dupe-keys.description: 禁止在对象字面量中出现重复的键名
no-dupe-keys.badExample: const foo = { bar: 1, bar: 2 };
no-dupe-keys.goodExample: const foo = { bar: 1, baz: 2 };

no-duplicate-case.name: no-duplicate-case
no-duplicate-case.description: 禁止在 switch 语句中出现重复测试表达式的 case
no-duplicate-case.badExample: switch (foo) { case 1: break; case 2: break; case 1: break; }
no-duplicate-case.goodExample: switch (foo) { case 1: break; case 2: break; case 3: break; }

no-duplicate-imports.name: no-duplicate-imports
no-duplicate-imports.badExample: import { readFile } from 'fs'; import { writeFile } from 'fs';
no-duplicate-imports.goodExample: import { readFile, writeFile } from 'fs';

no-else-return.name: no-else-return
no-else-return.description: 禁止在 else 内使用 return，必须改为提前结束
no-else-return.reason: else 中使用 return 可以使代码结构更清晰

no-empty.name: no-empty
no-empty.description: 禁止出现空代码块，允许 catch 为空代码块
no-empty.badExample: if (foo) { }
no-empty.goodExample: if (foo) { // do something } try { // do something } catch (e) {}

no-empty-character-class.name: no-empty-character-class
no-empty-character-class.description: 禁止在正则表达式中使用空的字符集 []
no-empty-character-class.badExample: const reg = /abc[]/;
no-empty-character-class.goodExample: const reg = /abc[a-z]/;

no-empty-function.name: no-empty-function
no-empty-function.reason: 有时需要将一个空函数设置为某个项的默认值

no-empty-pattern.name: no-empty-pattern
no-empty-pattern.description: 禁止解构赋值中出现空 {} 或 []
no-empty-pattern.badExample: const {} = foo;
no-empty-pattern.goodExample: const { bar } = foo;

no-eq-null.name: no-eq-null
no-eq-null.description: 禁止使用 foo == null，必须使用 foo === null
no-eq-null.badExample: if (foo == null) { }
no-eq-null.goodExample: if (foo === null) { }

no-eval.name: no-eval
no-eval.badExample: eval('const foo = 0');
no-eval.goodExample: const foo = 0;

no-ex-assign.name: no-ex-assign
no-ex-assign.description: 禁止将 catch 的第一个参数 error 重新赋值
no-ex-assign.badExample: try { } catch (e) { e = 10; }
no-ex-assign.goodExample: try { } catch (e) { console.error(e); }

no-extend-native.name: no-extend-native
no-extend-native.reason: 修改原生对象可能会与将来版本的 js 冲突
no-extend-native.badExample: Array.prototype.flat = function () { // do something }; [1, [2, 3]].flat();
no-extend-native.goodExample: function flat(arr) { // do something } flat([1, [2, 3]]);

no-extra-bind.name: no-extra-bind
no-extra-bind.description: 禁止出现没必要的 bind
no-extra-bind.badExample: (function () { foo(); }.bind(bar));
no-extra-bind.goodExample: (function () { this.foo(); }.bind(bar));

no-extra-boolean-cast.name: no-extra-boolean-cast
no-extra-boolean-cast.description: 禁止不必要的布尔类型转换
no-extra-boolean-cast.badExample: if (!!foo) { } if (Boolean(foo)) { }
no-extra-boolean-cast.goodExample: if (foo) { } if (!foo) { }

no-extra-label.name: no-extra-label
no-extra-label.description: 禁止出现没必要的 label
no-extra-label.reason: 已经禁止使用 label 了

no-fallthrough.name: no-fallthrough
no-fallthrough.description: switch 的 case 内必须有 break, return 或 throw，空的 case 除外
no-fallthrough.badExample: switch (foo) { case 1: doSomething(); case 2: doSomethingElse(); }
no-fallthrough.goodExample: switch (foo) { case 1: doSomething(); break; case 2: doSomethingElse(); } switch (foo) { case 1: case 2: doSomething(); }

no-func-assign.name: no-func-assign
no-func-assign.description: 禁止将一个函数声明重新赋值
no-func-assign.badExample: function foo() {} foo = 1;
no-func-assign.goodExample: let foo = function () {}; foo = 1;

no-global-assign.name: no-global-assign
no-global-assign.badExample: Object = null;
no-global-assign.goodExample: foo = null;

no-implicit-coercion.name: no-implicit-coercion
no-implicit-coercion.description: 禁止使用 ~+ 等难以理解的类型转换，仅允许使用 !!
no-implicit-coercion.badExample: const b = ~foo.indexOf('.'); const n = +foo; const m = 1 * foo; const s = '' + foo; foo += '';
no-implicit-coercion.goodExample: const b = foo.indexOf('.') !== -1; const n = Number(foo); const m = Number(foo); const s = String(foo); foo = String(foo); const c = !!foo;

no-implicit-globals.name: no-implicit-globals
no-implicit-globals.description: 禁止在全局作用域下定义变量或申明函数
no-implicit-globals.reason: 模块化之后，不会出现这种在全局作用域下定义变量的情况

no-implied-eval.name: no-implied-eval
no-implied-eval.description: 禁止在 setTimeout 或 setInterval 中传入字符串
no-implied-eval.badExample: setTimeout('alert("Hello World");', 1000);
no-implied-eval.goodExample: setTimeout(() => { alert('Hello World'); }, 1000);

no-import-assign.name: no-import-assign
no-import-assign.description: 禁止对导入的模块进行赋值
no-import-assign.badExample: import foo from 'foo'; foo = 1; import * as bar from 'bar'; bar.baz = 1;
no-import-assign.goodExample: import foo from 'foo'; foo.baz = 1; import * as bar from 'bar'; bar.baz.qux = 1;

no-inline-comments.name: no-inline-comments
no-inline-comments.description: 禁止在代码后添加单行注释

no-inner-declarations.name: no-inner-declarations
no-inner-declarations.description: 禁止在 if 代码块内出现函数声明
no-inner-declarations.badExample: if (foo) { function bar() {} }
no-inner-declarations.goodExample: if (foo) { const bar = function () {}; }

no-invalid-regexp.name: no-invalid-regexp
no-invalid-regexp.description: 禁止在 RegExp 构造函数中出现非法的正则表达式
no-invalid-regexp.badExample: const reg1 = new RegExp('['); const reg2 = new RegExp('.', 'z');
no-invalid-regexp.goodExample: const reg1 = new RegExp('[a-z]'); const reg2 = new RegExp('.', 'g');

no-invalid-this.name: no-invalid-this
no-invalid-this.description: 禁止在类之外的地方使用 this
no-invalid-this.reason: 只允许在 class 中使用 this
no-invalid-this.badExample: function foo() { this.a = 0; }
no-invalid-this.goodExample: class Foo { constructor() { this.a = 0; } }

no-irregular-whitespace.name: no-irregular-whitespace
no-irregular-whitespace.description: 禁止使用特殊空白符（比如全角空格），除非是出现在字符串、正则表达式或模版字符串中
no-irregular-whitespace.badExample: function foo()　{ }
no-irregular-whitespace.goodExample: const foo = '　'; const bar = /　/; const baz = `　`;

no-iterator.name: no-iterator
no-iterator.reason:
__iterator__ 是一个已废弃的属性
使用 [Symbol.iterator] 替代它
no-iterator.badExample: Foo.prototype.__iterator__ = function () { return new FooIterator(this); };
no-iterator.goodExample: let foo = {}; foo[Symbol.iterator] = function* () { yield 1; yield 2; yield 3; }; console.log([...foo]); // [1, 2, 3]

no-label-var.name: no-label-var
no-label-var.description: 禁止 label 名称与已定义的变量重复
no-label-var.reason: 已经禁止使用 label 了

no-labels.name: no-labels
no-labels.badExample: loop: for (let i = 0; i < 5; i++) { if (i === 1) { continue loop; } console.log(i); } // 0 2 3 4
no-labels.goodExample: for (let i = 0; i < 5; i++) { if (i === 1) { continue; } console.log(i); } // 0 2 3 4

no-lone-blocks.name: no-lone-blocks
no-lone-blocks.description: 禁止使用没必要的 {} 作为代码块
no-lone-blocks.badExample: { foo(); }
no-lone-blocks.goodExample: if (foo) { bar(); }

no-lonely-if.name: no-lonely-if
no-lonely-if.description: 禁止 else 中只有一个单独的 if
no-lonely-if.reason: 单独的 if 可以把逻辑表达的更清楚

no-loop-func.name: no-loop-func
no-loop-func.description: 禁止在循环内的函数内部出现循环体条件语句中定义的变量
no-loop-func.reason: 使用 let 就已经解决了这个问题了

no-misleading-character-class.name: no-misleading-character-class
no-misleading-character-class.description: 禁止正则表达式中使用肉眼无法区分的特殊字符
no-misleading-character-class.reason: 某些特殊字符很难看出差异，最好不要在正则中使用
no-misleading-character-class.badExample: /^[Á]$/u.test('Á'); // false
no-misleading-character-class.goodExample: /^[A]$/u.test('A'); // true

no-multi-assign.name: no-multi-assign
no-multi-assign.description: 禁止连续赋值，比如 foo = bar = 1

no-multi-str.name: no-multi-str
no-multi-str.description: 禁止使用 \ 来换行字符串
no-multi-str.badExample: const foo = 'Line 1\ Line 2';
no-multi-str.goodExample: const foo = `Line 1 Line 2`;

no-negated-condition.name: no-negated-condition
no-negated-condition.description: 禁止 if 里有否定的表达式
no-negated-condition.reason: 否定的表达式可以把逻辑表达的更清楚

no-nested-ternary.name: no-nested-ternary
no-nested-ternary.description: 禁止使用嵌套的三元表达式，比如 a ? b : c ? d : e

no-new.name: no-new
no-new.description: 禁止直接 new 一个类而不赋值
no-new.reason: new 应该作为创建一个类的实例的方法，所以不能不赋值
no-new.badExample: new Foo();
no-new.goodExample: const foo = new foo();

no-new-func.name: no-new-func
no-new-func.reason: 这和 eval 是等价的
no-new-func.badExample: const foo = new Function('a', 'b', 'return a + b');
no-new-func.goodExample: const foo = function (a, b) { return a + b; };

no-new-object.name: no-new-object
no-new-object.badExample: const foo = new Object();
no-new-object.goodExample: const foo = {};

no-new-symbol.name: no-new-symbol
no-new-symbol.description: 禁止使用 new 来生成 Symbol
no-new-symbol.badExample: const foo = new Symbol('foo');
no-new-symbol.goodExample: const foo = Symbol('foo');

no-new-wrappers.name: no-new-wrappers
no-new-wrappers.description: 禁止使用 new 来生成 String, Number 或 Boolean
no-new-wrappers.badExample: const s = new String('foo'); const n = new Number(1); const b = new Boolean(true);
no-new-wrappers.goodExample: const s = String(someValue); const n = Number(someValue); const b = Boolean(someValue);

no-obj-calls.name: no-obj-calls
no-obj-calls.description: 禁止将 Math, JSON 或 Reflect 直接作为函数调用
no-obj-calls.badExample: const foo = Math(); const bar = JSON(); const baz = Reflect();
no-obj-calls.goodExample: const foo = Math.random(); const bar = JSON.parse('{}'); const baz = Reflect.get({ x: 1, y: 2 }, 'x');

no-octal.name: no-octal
no-octal.description: 禁止使用 0 开头的数字表示八进制数

no-octal-escape.name: no-octal-escape
no-octal-escape.description: 禁止使用八进制的转义符

no-param-reassign.name: no-param-reassign
no-param-reassign.description: 禁止对函数的参数重新赋值
no-param-reassign.badExample: function foo(bar) { bar = bar || ''; }
no-param-reassign.goodExample: function foo(bar_) { bar = bar_ || ''; }

no-proto.name: no-proto
no-proto.badExample: const foo = bar.__proto__; bar.__proto__ = baz;
no-proto.goodExample: const foo = Object.getPrototypeOf(bar); Object.setPrototypeOf(bar, baz);

no-prototype-builtins.name: no-prototype-builtins
no-prototype-builtins.description: 禁止使用 hasOwnProperty, isPrototypeOf 或 propertyIsEnumerable

no-redeclare.name: no-redeclare
no-redeclare.reason: 禁用 var 之后，编译阶段就会报错了

no-regex-spaces.name: no-regex-spaces
no-regex-spaces.description: 禁止在正则表达式中出现连续的空格
no-regex-spaces.badExample: const reg1 = /foo bar/; const reg2 = new RegExp('foo bar');
no-regex-spaces.goodExample: const reg1 = /foo {3}bar/; const reg2 = new RegExp('foo {3}bar');

no-restricted-exports.name: no-restricted-exports
no-restricted-exports.description: 禁止导出指定的变量名

no-restricted-globals.name: no-restricted-globals
no-restricted-globals.description: 禁止使用指定的全局变量

no-restricted-properties.name: no-restricted-properties
no-restricted-properties.description: 禁止使用指定的对象属性

no-return-assign.name: no-return-assign
no-return-assign.description: 禁止在 return 语句里赋值
no-return-assign.badExample: function foo() { return (bar = 1); }
no-return-assign.goodExample: function foo() { bar = 1; return bar; }

no-return-await.name: no-return-await
no-return-await.description: 禁止在 return 语句里使用 await

no-script-url.name: no-script-url
no-script-url.reason: 有些场景下还是需要用到这个

no-self-assign.name: no-self-assign
no-self-assign.description: 禁止将自己赋值给自己
no-self-assign.badExample: foo = foo;
no-self-assign.goodExample: foo = bar;

no-self-compare.name: no-self-compare
no-self-compare.description: 禁止将自己与自己比较
no-self-compare.badExample: if (foo === foo) { } if (NaN === NaN) { }
no-self-compare.goodExample: if (foo === bar) { } if (isNaN(foo)) { }

no-sequences.name: no-sequences
no-sequences.badExample: foo = doSomething(), 1;
no-sequences.goodExample: doSomething(); foo = 1;

no-setter-return.name: no-setter-return
no-setter-return.description: 禁止 setter 有返回值
no-setter-return.badExample: const foo = { set bar(value) { this.barValue = 'bar ' + value; return this.barValue; } };
no-setter-return.goodExample: const foo = { set bar(value) { this.barValue = 'bar ' + value; } };

no-shadow.name: no-shadow
no-shadow.description: 禁止变量名与上层作用域内的已定义的变量重复
no-shadow.reason: 很多时候函数的形参和传参是同名的

no-shadow-restricted-names.name: no-shadow-restricted-names
no-shadow-restricted-names.description: 禁止使用保留字作为变量名
no-shadow-restricted-names.badExample: const undefined = 1; function foo(NaN) {} function Infinity() {}
no-shadow-restricted-names.goodExample: console.log(undefined); console.log(NaN); console.log(Infinity);

no-sparse-arrays.name: no-sparse-arrays
no-sparse-arrays.description: 禁止在数组中出现连续的逗号
no-sparse-arrays.badExample: const foo = [1, 2, , 3];
no-sparse-arrays.goodExample: const foo = [1, 2, 3];

no-template-curly-in-string.name: no-template-curly-in-string
no-template-curly-in-string.description: 禁止在普通字符串中出现模版字符串里的变量形式
no-template-curly-in-string.badExample: const foo = 'Hello ${bar}';
no-template-curly-in-string.goodExample: const foo = 'Hello {bar}';

no-this-before-super.name: no-this-before-super
no-this-before-super.description: 禁止在 super 被调用之前使用 this 或 super
no-this-before-super.badExample: class Foo extends Bar { constructor() { this.foo = 1; super(); } }
no-this-before-super.goodExample: class Foo extends Bar { constructor() { super(); this.foo = 1; } }

no-throw-literal.name: no-throw-literal
no-throw-literal.description: 禁止 throw 字面量，必须 throw 一个 Error 对象
no-throw-literal.badExample: throw 'foo'; throw 1;
no-throw-literal.goodExample: throw new Error('foo');

no-undef.name: no-undef
no-undef.description: 禁止使用未定义的变量
no-undef.badExample: nt(no-undef)">foo(bar);
no-undef.goodExample: function foo() {} const bar = 1; foo(bar); if (typeof baz === 'number') { }

no-undef-init.name: no-undef-init
no-undef-init.description: 禁止将 undefined 赋值给变量
no-undef-init.badExample: let foo = undefined;

no-underscore-dangle.name: no-underscore-dangle
no-underscore-dangle.description: 禁止变量名出现下划线

no-unmodified-loop-condition.name: no-unmodified-loop-condition
no-unmodified-loop-condition.description: 循环内必须对循环条件中的变量有修改
no-unmodified-loop-condition.badExample: let foo = 10; while (foo) { console.log(foo); }
no-unmodified-loop-condition.goodExample: let foo = 10; while (foo) { console.log(foo); foo--; }

no-unneeded-ternary.name: no-unneeded-ternary
no-unneeded-ternary.description: 必须使用 !a 替代 a ? false : true

no-unreachable.name: no-unreachable
no-unreachable.description: 禁止在 return, throw, break 或 continue 之后还有代码
no-unreachable.badExample: function foo() { return; const bar = 1; }
no-unreachable.goodExample: function foo() { return; // const bar = 1; }

no-unsafe-finally.name: no-unsafe-finally
no-unsafe-finally.description: 禁止在 finally 中出现 return, throw, break 或 continue
no-unsafe-finally.reason: finally 中的语句会在 try 之前执行
no-unsafe-finally.badExample: function foo() { try { return 1; } finally { // finally 会在 try 之前执行，故会 return 2 return 2; } }
no-unsafe-finally.goodExample: function foo() { try { return 1; } finally { console.log(2); } }

no-unsafe-negation.name: no-unsafe-negation
no-unsafe-negation.description: 禁止在 in 或 instanceof 操作符的左侧变量前使用感叹号
no-unsafe-negation.badExample: if (!key in object) { } if (!obj instanceof SomeClass) { }
no-unsafe-negation.goodExample: if (!(key in object)) { } if (!(obj instanceof SomeClass)) { }

no-unused-expressions.name: no-unused-expressions
no-unused-expressions.badExample: 1; foo; ('foo'); foo && bar; foo || bar; foo ? bar : baz; `bar`;
no-unused-expressions.goodExample: 'use strict'; foo && bar(); foo || bar(); foo ? bar() : baz(); foo`bar`;

no-unused-labels.name: no-unused-labels
no-unused-labels.description: 禁止出现没用到的 label
no-unused-labels.reason: 已经禁止使用 label 了

no-unused-vars.name: no-unused-vars
no-unused-vars.description: 已定义的变量必须使用
no-unused-vars.badExample: let foo = 1; foo = 2; function bar(baz) {} const { o-unused-vars)">baz, ...rest } = data;
no-unused-vars.goodExample: let foo = 1; console.log(foo); function bar(baz) {} bar(); const { baz, ...rest } = data; console.log(baz, rest); try { } catch (e) {}

no-use-before-define.name: no-use-before-define
no-use-before-define.description: 变量必须先定义后使用
no-use-before-define.badExample: console.log(foo); const foo = 1; new Baz(); class Baz {}
no-use-before-define.goodExample: (() => { console.log(foo); })(); const foo = 1; console.log(foo); bar(); function bar() {} (() => { new Baz(); })(); class Baz {} new Baz();

no-useless-backreference.name: no-useless-backreference
no-useless-backreference.description: 禁止正则表达式中出现无用的回溯引用
no-useless-backreference.reason: 某些回溯引用语法上没问题，但是会永远匹配到空字符串
no-useless-backreference.badExample: /^(?:(a)|\1b)$/; // reference to (a) into another alternative
no-useless-backreference.goodExample: /^(?:(a)|(b)\2)$/; // reference to (b)

no-useless-call.name: no-useless-call
no-useless-call.description: 禁止出现没必要的 call 或 apply
no-useless-call.badExample: foo.call(null, 1, 2, 3); // foo(1, 2, 3) foo.apply(null, [1, 2, 3]); // foo(1, 2, 3) foo.bar.call(foo, 1, 2, 3); // foo.bar(1, 2, 3); foo.bar.apply(foo, [1, 2, 3]); // foo.bar(1, 2, 3);
no-useless-call.goodExample: foo.call(bar, 1, 2, 3); foo.apply(bar, [1, 2, 3]); foo.bar.call(baz, 1, 2, 3); foo.bar.apply(baz, [1, 2, 3]);

no-useless-catch.name: no-useless-catch
no-useless-catch.description: 禁止在 catch 中仅仅只是把错误 throw 出去
no-useless-catch.reason: 这样的 catch 是没有意义的，等价于直接执行 try 里的代码
no-useless-catch.badExample: try { doSomethingThatMightThrow(); } catch (e) { throw e; }
no-useless-catch.goodExample: doSomethingThatMightThrow(); try { doSomethingThatMightThrow(); } catch (e) { doSomethingBeforeRethrow(); throw e; }

no-useless-computed-key.name: no-useless-computed-key
no-useless-computed-key.description: 禁止出现没必要的计算键名
no-useless-computed-key.badExample: const foo = { ['1']: 1, ['bar']: 'bar' };
no-useless-computed-key.goodExample: const foo = { 1: 1, bar: 'bar' };

no-useless-concat.name: no-useless-concat
no-useless-concat.description: 禁止出现没必要的字符串连接
no-useless-concat.badExample: const foo = 'f' + 'oo'; const bar = `b` + `ar`;
no-useless-concat.goodExample: const foo = 'fo'; const bar = 1 + `ar`;

no-useless-constructor.name: no-useless-constructor
no-useless-constructor.description: 禁止出现没必要的 constructor
no-useless-constructor.badExample: class Foo { constructor() {} } class Bar extends Foo { constructor(...args) { super(...args); } }
no-useless-constructor.goodExample: class Foo { constructor() { doSomething(); } } class Bar extends Foo { constructor(...args) { super(...args); doSomething(); } }

no-useless-escape.name: no-useless-escape
no-useless-escape.description: 禁止出现没必要的转义
no-useless-escape.reason: 转义可以使代码更易懂

no-useless-rename.name: no-useless-rename
no-useless-rename.description: 禁止解构赋值时出现同样名字的的重命名，比如 let { foo: foo } = bar;
no-useless-rename.badExample: import { foo as foo } from 'foo'; const bar = 1; export { bar as bar }; let { baz: baz } = foo;
no-useless-rename.goodExample: import { foo } from 'foo'; const bar = 1; export { bar }; let { baz } = foo;

no-var.name: no-var
no-var.badExample: var foo = 1;
no-var.goodExample: let foo = 1; const bar = 2;

no-void.name: no-void
no-void.badExample: function foo() { return void 0; }
no-void.goodExample: function foo() { return; }

no-warning-comments.name: no-warning-comments
no-warning-comments.description: 禁止注释中出现 TODO 和 FIXME

object-shorthand.name: object-shorthand
object-shorthand.description: 必须使用 a = {b} 而不是 a = {b: b}
object-shorthand.reason: 有时后者可以使代码结构更清晰

one-var.name: one-var
one-var.description: 禁止变量申明时用逗号一次申明多个
one-var.badExample: let foo, bar; const baz = 1, qux = 2;
one-var.goodExample: let foo; let bar; const baz = 1; const qux = 2;

operator-assignment.name: operator-assignment
operator-assignment.description: 必须使用 x = x + y 而不是 x += y

padding-line-between-statements.name: padding-line-between-statements
padding-line-between-statements.description: 限制语句之间的空行规则，比如变量定义完之后必须要空行

prefer-const.name: prefer-const
prefer-const.description: 申明后不再被修改的变量必须使用 const 来申明

prefer-exponentiation-operator.name: prefer-exponentiation-operator
prefer-exponentiation-operator.description: 使用 ES2016 的语法 ** 替代 Math.pow

prefer-named-capture-group.name: prefer-named-capture-group
prefer-named-capture-group.description: 使用 ES2018 中的正则表达式命名组
prefer-named-capture-group.reason: 正则表达式已经较难理解了，没必要强制加上命名组

prefer-numeric-literals.name: prefer-numeric-literals
prefer-numeric-literals.description: 必须使用 0b11111011 而不是 parseInt()

prefer-object-spread.name: prefer-object-spread
prefer-object-spread.description: 必须使用 ... 而不是 Object.assign，除非 Object.assign 的第一个参数是一个变量
prefer-object-spread.badExample: const foo = Object.assign({}, bar);
prefer-object-spread.goodExample: const foo = { ...bar }; // 第一个参数为变量时允许使用 Object.assign Object.assign(foo, baz);

prefer-promise-reject-errors.name: prefer-promise-reject-errors
prefer-promise-reject-errors.description: Promise 的 reject 中必须传入 Error 对象，而不是字面量
prefer-promise-reject-errors.badExample: Promise.reject('foo'); new Promise((resolve, reject) => { reject(); }); new Promise((resolve, reject) => { reject('foo'); });
prefer-promise-reject-errors.goodExample: Promise.reject(new Error('foo')); new Promise((resolve, reject) => { reject(new Error('foo')); });

prefer-regex-literals.name: prefer-regex-literals
prefer-regex-literals.description: 优先使用正则表达式字面量，而不是 RegExp 构造函数
prefer-regex-literals.badExample: new RegExp('abc'); new RegExp('\\.', 'g');
prefer-regex-literals.goodExample: /abc/; /\./g; new RegExp(prefix + 'abc');

prefer-rest-params.name: prefer-rest-params
prefer-rest-params.description: 必须使用 ...args 而不是 arguments

prefer-spread.name: prefer-spread
prefer-spread.description: 必须使用 ... 而不是 apply，比如 foo(...args)

prefer-template.name: prefer-template
prefer-template.description: 必须使用模版字符串而不是字符串连接

radix.name: radix
radix.description: parseInt 必须传入第二个参数
radix.badExample: const foo = parseInt('071'); // 57
radix.goodExample: const foo = parseInt('071', 10); // 71

require-atomic-updates.name: require-atomic-updates
require-atomic-updates.description: 禁止将 await 或 yield 的结果做为运算符的后面项
require-atomic-updates.reason:
这样会导致不符合预期的结果
https://github.com/eslint/eslint/issues/11899
在上面 issue 修复之前，关闭此规则

require-await.name: require-await
require-await.description: async 函数中必须存在 await 语句

require-unicode-regexp.name: require-unicode-regexp
require-unicode-regexp.description: 正则表达式中必须要加上 u 标志

require-yield.name: require-yield
require-yield.description: generator 函数内必须有 yield
require-yield.badExample: function* foo() { return 1; }
require-yield.goodExample: function* foo() { yield 1; return 2; }

sort-keys.name: sort-keys
sort-keys.description: 对象字面量的键名必须排好序

spaced-comment.name: spaced-comment
spaced-comment.description: 注释的斜线或 * 后必须有空格
spaced-comment.badExample: //foo /*bar */ /**baz */
spaced-comment.goodExample: // foo /* bar */ /** baz */

strict.name: strict
strict.badExample: 'use strict'; function foo() { 'use strict'; }
strict.goodExample: function foo() {}

symbol-description.name: symbol-description
symbol-description.description: 创建 Symbol 时必须传入参数
symbol-description.badExample: const foo = Symbol();
symbol-description.goodExample: const foo = Symbol('foo');

use-isnan.name: use-isnan
use-isnan.description: 必须使用 isNaN(foo) 而不是 foo === NaN
use-isnan.badExample: if (foo === NaN) { }
use-isnan.goodExample: if (isNaN(foo)) { }

valid-typeof.name: valid-typeof
valid-typeof.description: typeof 表达式比较的对象必须是 'undefined', 'object', 'boolean', 'number', 'string', 'function', 'symbol', 或 'bigint'
valid-typeof.badExample: if (typeof foo === 'numbe') { }
valid-typeof.goodExample: if (typeof foo === 'number') { }

vars-on-top.name: vars-on-top
vars-on-top.description: var 必须在作用域的最前面

yoda.name: yoda
yoda.description: 必须使用 if (foo === 5) 而不是 if (5 === foo)
yoda.badExample: if (1 === foo) { }
yoda.goodExample: if (foo === 1) { } if (1 < foo) { } if (1 < foo && foo < 10) { }
